name: Grand River Physiotherapy
comment:
Community physiotherapy clinic * health professionals assess and treat conditions that affect the muscles, nerves, and bones that may be caused by work or sports or motor vehicle collision injuries, chronic conditions, or to recover after an operation (hip and knee surgery)

OHIP-insured physiotherapy clinic
serviceProvisionCode: Set fee * physiotherapy services may be covered by OHIP or third-party insurance, if eligible

Set fee * physiotherapy services may be covered by OHIP or third-party insurance, if eligible

People who require physiotherapy services * OHIP coverage for those 19 years and under, 65 years and older, ODSP or Ontario Works recipients, and people hospitalized for at least one night due to an injury

Community physiotherapy clinic * health professionals assess and treat conditions that affect the muscles, nerves, and bones that may be caused by work or sports or motor vehicle collision injuries, chronic conditions, or to recover after an operation (hip and knee surgery)
